events.title: Neighborhood Clean-Up Day
events.description: Join us for a community clean-up event at Central Park in Springfield. Help make our neighborhood cleaner and greener!

events.title: Food Drive for Local Shelter
events.description: Support our food drive to help those in need at the Community Center in Greenfield. Donate non-perishable food items for the local shelter.

events.title: Book Donation Campaign
events.description: Contribute to our book donation campaign at Library Hall in Oakville. Share the joy of reading by donating your books.

events.title: Senior Home Visit Program
events.description: Brighten the day of seniors at Sunshine Retirement Home in Riverdale. Join us for a visit and share some quality time with them.
